data.title: Just Don't Stop Here !
data.text: Oh my.... this is a disaster. Anytime you mix Chinese with Mexican and seafood and American desserts.... and put it on a buffet line to lose what little taste there was at first.. Some of this food just could not be eaten after a first bite. We ate at about 12:30... in the prime time of the day so you would suppose the food would be somewhat fresh. Wrong...! It seemed more like it was fresh the day before. There are plenty of other dining options around this area. Choose one of the other ones. For your stomach's sake.

data.title: The best thing here is the door.
data.text: Of all the Chinese buffets near us... there are at least 5... this is the worst. Food is cold and old tasting. The shrimp smelt like week old fish guts (that may be a little bit of an over statement). I will not be back.

data.title: Don't waste your time or money!
data.text: I haven't been here in a couple of years. Moved out of the area. Had to go to NRH today so stopped in for lunch. It was 11:30,prime time for lunch. Maybe 15 customers there. First noticed the floor was sticky all around buffet tables. My shoes making noise every time I lifted them up. Nothing from the hot items were hot. Room temperature. Unacceptable! Server was prompt and friendly or would have given a worse score. For $9.75+tip,never again.
